mapper.insert: insert into point_ledger (task_id, point_in, point_out, user_id, process_user_id, create_time, remark, act_type) values (#{taskId}, #{pointIn}, #{pointOut}, #{userId}, #{processUserId}, #{createTime}, #{remark},#{actType})
mapper.select: select point_ledger.ids, point_out, create_user.user_id as create_user_id, create_user.name as create_user_name, create_user.phone as create_user_phone, point_ledger.create_time, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, act_type, point_ledger.read_time, point_ledger.process_result from (point_ledger left join user_info create_user on point_ledger.user_id = create_user.user_id) left join user_info process_user on process_user_id = process_user.user_id where act_type = 'POINT_WITHDRAW' and process_result is null

select point_ledger.ids, point_ledger.task_id, point_in, point_out, point_ledger.user_id, user_info.name as user_name, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, point_ledger.create_time, remark, act_type, title from ((point_ledger left join task on point_ledger.task_id=task.task_id) left join user_info on point_ledger.user_id=user_info.user_id) left join user_info process_user on process_user_id=process_user.user_id where 1=1 and point_ledger.user_id=#{userId} order by ids desc limit #{offset},#{size}
